Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| short-circuit current |
| photovoltaic performance |

The two "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "short-circuit current" and "photovoltaic performance". These terms refer to specific properties related to the performance of solar cells or photovoltaic devices.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I realize that there is only one clear "Material Property" mentioned, which is "short-circuit current". Here is the table with the valid entity:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| short-circuit current |

The term "photovoltaic performance" is a general description of a device's performance rather than a specific material property.

Paragraph: 27,28 In our previous study , PSCs based on DTP - containing copolymers and PC 70 BM showed a short - circuit current as high as 22.6 mA cm^-1 , 29 indicating that DTP - containing copolymers could be promising building blocks for superior photovoltaic performance.
